title: Home for sale in Thalawathugoda
details:
Beautiful house for sale in Thalawathugoda town ( Waking distance to Parliament road )

100 meters to the main road.

House is located in very good environment with an amazing view of the paddy

20 perch land
2 storied house 3800sqft

4 bedrooms
3 bathrooms

Maids room and 1 bathrooms

Spacious living areas
Beautiful garden with CCTV camera system

Price 50 Million

Contact Reach Real Estate : 0772525457
